sectionTwo.title: Bringing the wealth management industry into Web 3.0
sectionTwo.content: Smat provides seamless access to crypto-currencies and digital assets by linking Traditional Finance (TradFi) to Decentralized Finance (DeFi). Manage the full range of Web 3.0 financial services and accessing, from Security Tokens to NFTs and everything in between.  Invest in the latest opportunities from all-in-one efficient tool

sectionThree.title: Strategic Roadmap

sectionThree.content: We are supported by an exclusive consortium of ambassador composing our DAO. The Smat ambassador community is composed of wealth managers with a strong focus on cryptocurrency. They will be members of the DAO guiding the Smat business. List of members to be detailed soon.
